name: Lunar Mirror
description:
This is a Horizontal exploration horror suspense puzzle game. The story takes place in a research institute in a remote mountainous area. Ordinary researchers were involved in a conspiracy because of an accident. In order to save the missing friend, the protagonist begins to investigate the matter in depth. With the protagonist's investigation, the truth slowly appears.
The game is the background of the Cthulhu horror story, which can bring you a tense and exciting experience.
You can use the A or D keys to move the character left and right to explore. Solve puzzles and advance the plot by collecting clues and props.
The game is divided into day and night. During the day, the environment is normal, and clues and props can be collected. The night is full of dangers, there may be monsters chasing, more areas can be explored and puzzles can be solved.
In addition to the main storyline, there are also many sideline stories. By completing the sideline stories, you can get more props to improve the character's physical and mental value, and you can learn more about the character's background story.
The game has a variety of endings, and different choices in the process will lead to different directions of the plot, which can be cleared multiple times.
